title: Visualization
description: A webgl visualization made of a sequence of tracks

labels.description: set of labels to display on visualization, properties of labels can be any valid attribute for an svg text element

x.description: x coordinate of label with respect to data coordinates, should be on scale with [-1, 1] if x dimension is categorical or genomic

y.description: y coordinate of label with respect to data coordinates, should be on scale with [-1, 1] if y dimension is categorical or genomic

fixedX.description: fix the x coordinate of the label, so it does not move when panning/zooming left or right

fixedY.description: fix the y coordinate of the label, so it does not move when panning/zooming up or down

tracks.description: A track is a map from the data to a sequence of marks

defaultData.description: A string of a csv href containing data or an object of inline data where each key is a column of values

width.description: Width of the visualization in css units

height.description: Height of the visualization in css units

margins.description: Margins for the visualization; gives more space for labels and axis to render

top.description: Top margin of the visualization in css units

bottom.description: Bottom margin of the visualization in css units

left.description: Left margin of the visualization in css units

right.description: Right margin of the visualization in css units

allOf.description: if there is no default data for the visualization require each track to have data property
